name: Super Space Pug
description: Super Space Pug is a classic arcade shmup. Take control of 'Demetrius the Third'(Space Pug) to defend your personal space from the evil, fish flinging cats and random rocks because its a space shmup, and without rocks it would be rather non-space-y.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or newer Processor: 2Ghz or better Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 256 Mb Sound Card: Any
